scripts.docker:run:production: docker run -p 80:5000 -e ASPNETCORE_URLS=http://+:5000 -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Production --name gcp-demo --restart=always yanshibainu/gcp-demo
scripts.docker:run:premise: docker run -p 80:5000 -e ASPNETCORE_URLS=http://+:5000 -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Premise --name gcp-demo --restart=always yanshibainu/gcp-demo
scripts.docker:run:cloud: docker run -p 80:5000 -e ASPNETCORE_URLS=http://+:5000 -e ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT=Cloud --name gcp-demo --restart=always yanshibainu/gcp-demo
